Detailed Description

< This is the class that takes care of data validation < All the data is saved in a map in string format

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

NGS::uHeader::uHeader (  ) 

Default constructor.

If the param exist, it returns it's value in string format. Otherwise returns param_not_found error.

Parameters:
header_param name the name of the param from header_param strongly type enum types.

< Register our functions

< Validate functions

< Post processing function
